charges.charge_description: Did knowingly and intentionally distribute approx..49 of one gram of a mixture or substance containing a cocaine base (also knows as crack cocaine). 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C). Date of Offense: January 12, 1998. Penalty: (each count) Not more than 20 years of imprisonment, a fine of up to $1 million, at least 3 years SRT, a $100 special assessment, and community restitution up to the amount of any fine imposed by the court. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: 35 mos BOP; 3 years SRT; $100 special assessment; drug treatment &; detection program as directed by USPO (1)
